author: boop3247
content: But does flashbots enable _all_ the known types of MEV? Or is it just a small subset? Also, I saw it mention on their docs that "80% of hash power currently support flashbots"... Does that mean 80% of hashing power is using the flashbots geth fork? I was honestly under the impression miners didn't actually use geth at all ðŸ˜„
